Create an underwater drone to capture high-quality footage of the ocean floor.
Develop a system for detecting and analyzing marine life in real-time, using advanced sensors and machine learning algorithms.
Design a submersible vehicle that can withstand extreme pressures and temperatures, allowing it to explore depths previously inaccessible.
Explore the possibility of extracting valuable resources from the ocean floor, such as minerals or hydrocarbons.
Study the effects of human activity on the ocean environment, including pollution and overfishing, and develop solutions to mitigate these impacts.
